title: We need key binding profiles riot please!
body:
we need key binding profiles!!! 
for example me and my girlfriend both use my computer yet she uses standard keys i use different keys and mouse bindings for flash ignite etc would be simpler to just select use profile 1 then she uses profile 2 etc or if your key bindings stayed with your account so if i logged onto my mates computer i could still have my key bindings!
please riot!

replies.body: I'm not sure if this function will be implemented but i guess i know the solution to your problem although i'm not sure if it will work because i have never tested it. 1st you set all your key bindings and then close the game. After that go to your program files and look for the league of legends game folder and copy the game folder into a portable storage device. After that everytime you want to play league just load your game from the portable storage device and the key bindings should be the same even if you play league on different computers.
If you try this let me know
buy a better keyboard, my razer keyboard does everything you mentioned and more :)
and yes it unplugs via usb and retains its info so its easily portable
Some people have laptops. That means the consumer has to fix the games problem/lack of solution.
